description: This file defines a Java class NoteMapper that provides static methods to convert between Note entities and various Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) such as NoteCreateRequest, NoteUpdateRequest, and NoteResponse. It facilitates mapping logic for creating, updating, and responding with Note data within the application.

classes.name: NoteMapper
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to map between Note entity and its corresponding DTOs (CreateRequest, UpdateRequest, Response).

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts a NoteCreateRequest DTO into a Note entity, initializing a new Note with a generated ID and setting its title and content based on the request.

methods.name: updateEntity
methods.description: Updates an existing Note entity's title and content based on a NoteUpdateRequest DTO.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Note entity into a NoteResponse DTO, including its ID, title, content, creation, and update timestamps.
